result.execSummary:
The defendant Jessica L Mielke was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jessica L Mielke is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jessica L Mielke was found guilty of Possess Amphetamine/LSD/Psilocin, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $243 to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervison or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.  $200 DNA surcharge remitted.
Defendant shall not use/possess drug paraphernalia and/or controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Maintain absolute sobriety.
Random UA & BA testing at discretion of agent.
